entry.title: Over 300 Armenians still missing since 2020 war, says Red Cross

media:group.media:title: Over 300 Armenians still missing since 2020 war, says Red Cross
media:group.media:description:
๐Over 300 Armenians are still missing since the end of the 2020 Karabakh war, according to a new report by the Red Cross. ๐Mkhitar Matevosyan, the mayor of the town of Vayk and a Civil Contract member, allegedly took part in corrupt business dealings, Armenian investigative outlet Hetq reported. ๐Armenia won gold in the European Youth Weightlifting Championships.

ยซิฑีฌีตีกีถีฝยป ีฏีธึีฝีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ, ิฒีิฟ-ีกีฏีกีถ ีถีกีญีฏีซีถ ีบีกีฟีฃีกีดีกีพีธึ ีีซีฃึีกีถ ีึึีซีญีกีถีตีกีถีถ ีธึ ิฑีผีซีถีปีซ ิดีธึึีตีกีถ ีฉีกีฒีกีดีกีฝีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีจ ีกีตีฝ ีฟีกึีพีก ีฝีฏีฆีขีซึ ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีซึีกึ ีคีกีฟีซ ีฟีกีฌึ ีีกีฟีณีกีผีจ ิดีธึึีตีกีถ ีฉีกีฒีกีดีกีฝีซ 13-ึีค ึีธีฒีธึีธึีด ีึึีซีญีกีถีตีกีถีซ ีฟีกีถ ีฏีกีผีธึึีกีบีกีฟีธึีดีถ ีงึ ีึึีซีญีกีถีตีกีถีจ ีพีฅึีกีฏีกีผีธึึีธึีด ีง ีฃีธีตีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีธึีถีฅึีธีฒ ีซึ ีฟีธึีถีจ ึ ีฅึีฏีธึ ีถีธึ ีขีถีกีฏีฅีฌีซ ีฟีถีฅึ ีฏีกีผีธึึีธึีด, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีฐีกึึีกีถีถีฅึีจ ีบีถีคีธึีด ีฅีถ, ีฉีฅ ีขีกีฆีดีกีขีถีกีฏีกึีกีถ ีทีฅีถึีซ ีถีดีกีถ ีถีก ีพีกีณีกีผึีซ ีง ีคึีฅีฌ ีซึ ีขีถีกีฏีกึีกีถีถีฅึีจ, ีดีซีถีนีคีฅีผ ีคึีก ีฉีธึีตีฌีฟีพีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีนีธึีถีซึ

media:group.media:description:
๐Russiaโs Foreign Ministry said it is planning to organize high-level talks with Armenian and Azerbaijani officials by the end of the month. ๐Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi reiterated that Iran will oppose any attempts to alter its borders in the Caucasus in a phone call with Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan. ๐Armeniaโs Foreign Ministry denied news in the Turkish press saying that Armenia and Turkeyโs special envoys for normalization talks will meet again next month. ๐The Armenian government will allocate over $6.5 million to complete construction on three roads. ๐The authorities in Karabakh said the situation along the line of contact remains โrelatively stable,โ despite โcertain tensions.โ

media:group.media:description:
ิฑีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟีกีฆีธีฟีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีซ ีถีกีญีกีฃีกีฐ ิฑึีฅีฃ ีีธีนีซีถีตีกีถีจ ีฏีกึีฎีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีกึีกีฟีกีพีธึ ีฑีฅีผีกีฃีซึ ีง ีธึีคีฅีฃึีฅีฌ. ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ิฑึึีกีญีตีกีถ ีพีฅึีปีซีถ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซ, ีกีตีถีบีฅีฝ ีงีฌ ีคึีกีถีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีฎ ีขีธีฌีธึ ีฝึีกึีธึีดีถีฅึีซ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึีธีพ ีฝีฏีฝีธึีด ีง ีฆีขีกีฒีพีฅีฌ, ีดีซีกีตีถ ีฅึีข ยซีคีกีถีกีฏีจ ีฐีกีฝีฅีฌ ีง ีธีฝีฏีธึีซีถยปึ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิณึีธึีฃ ินีธีฝีธึีถีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีถีก ีกีฝีธึีด ีงี ีซีทีญีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีกีตีค ึีกีตีฌีซีถ ีง ีฃีถีธึีด, ีธึีบีฅีฝีฆีซ ยซีฆีซีปีธึีดีถีฅึีถ ีจีถีฏีกีฌีฅีฌีซ ีฌีซีถีฅีถ ีฐีกีฝีกึีกีฏีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกึ ึ ีธึึีง ีฏีฅึีบ ีนีพีถีกีฝีฅีถ ีซึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีพีกึีฏีกีถีซีทีซีถยปึ ยซีีก ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฝีกึีฝีกึีฅีฌีซ ีง, ีซีฝีฏ ีซึีฅีถึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีกึีซีฅึีกีตีซ ีฐีกีดีกึี ีจีถีคีธึีถีฅีฌีซยป,- ีทีฅีทีฟีธึีด ีง ึีกีฒีกึีกีฃีฅีฟีจึ

entry.title: Images appear online of Berdzor church converted into mosque

media:group.media:title: Images appear online of Berdzor church converted into mosque
media:group.media:description:
On August 25, the Lachin corridor, including the Armenian-populated communities of Aghavno, Berdzor (also known as Lachin), and Sus, will be handed over to Azerbaijan. CivilNetโs Karabakh team went to Aghavno and Berdzor after the evacuation order was announced to talk to residents. What do they think about leaving? What assistance are they receiving? And what do they want others to know about the decision that has led to them losing their homes?

entry.title: What challenges is Armeniaโs healthcare system facing?

media:group.media:title: What challenges is Armeniaโs healthcare system facing?
media:group.media:description:
Noubar Afeyan, co-founder of the ARMENIA 2041 Foundation, sat down with Anahit Avanesyan, Armeniaโs health minister, to talk about her career working in the countryโs healthcare system. Avanesyan also discussed the importance of public-private partnerships in the healthcare sector, how her ministry dealt with the fallout of the COVID-19 pandemic and the 2020 Karabakh war, and what challenges Armeniaโs healthcare system is facing today.
